mapper.select: select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_date, a.game_dev, a.game_img, a.game_video, a.age_grade, b.dis_end from game a, discount b where a.game_id = b.game_id

select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_img from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c, discount d where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and a.game_id = d.game_id
and b.detail_id = #{detailId1}
and a.game_id IN ( select a.game_id from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c, discount d where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and a.game_id = d.game_id and b.detail_id = #{detailId2})
and a.game_id IN (select a.game_id from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c, discount d where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and a.game_id = d.game_id and b.detail_id = #{detailId3})
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName1} || '%'
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName2} || '%'
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName3} || '%'
and a.game_price <= #{gamePrice}
order by 1
select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_img from game a, discount b where a.game_id = b.game_id and lower(a.game_name) like '%' || lower(#{gameName}) || '%'

select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_date, a.age_grade, a.game_video, c.detail_name, d.cate_name, f.pub_name from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c, category d, publish e, publisher f where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and c.cate_id = d.cate_id and a.game_id = e.game_id and e.pub_id = f.pub_id and a.game_id = #{gameId}
